item.title: Teach Girlfriend to make a Web Pages like Zhihu
item.description: My girlfriend is learning html and css recently. I told her to follow the video. Here, I recommend a video in Chinese that suite for fresh learners. The name of course is Getting HTML web pages dev in 8 hours ( 8小时学会HTML网页开发 ) . I watched this video at very first time. The teacher named Eighteen Swallows ( 燕十八 ) . He teached very clear even himself being on screen to show what is float or box-model.
